Articles.Content:
Capable of low Kerbin orbit either with a small cargo or with a crew module if you choose to substitute it for the cargo bay. (Designed for stock atmo model)

![sGhyDfp.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/sGhyDfp.png?1)

Ascent

![A5ZenOw.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/A5ZenOw.png?1)

Orbit

![qBydk5b.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/qBydk5b.png?1)

Instructions:

-Activate SAS

-Activate rapiers at full throttle

-Accelerate to more than 1200 m/s at highest operating altitude.

-Activate aerospike engine when rapiers switch mode

-De-activate rapiers once the additional thrust is not needed

-Coast to apoapsis

-Circularize orbit

Action groups:

1: toggle rapiers

2: toggle aerospike

3: toggle ladder

Craft file:

Light SSTO.craft copy 119 KB

[https://mega.co.nz/#!6l1TAIgQ!As1kUjx-nk5UaZxNgYdlzwG6mF3hg7jy4BZ-n4FSz98](https://mega.co.nz/#!6l1TAIgQ!As1kUjx-nk5UaZxNgYdlzwG6mF3hg7jy4BZ-n4FSz98)

-Argon

Looks more like a medium weight SSTO to me... a few modifications, I bet it could make it to Minmus, or possibly even Duna. Just swap out the Aerospike for a Nuke and use the offset tool to hide most of it after you have the action groups set.
